item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (possessive, modifying, or descriptive particle); of
2: aim; clear
3: really and truly
item.A:
1: de 2: dì 3: dí
有的 yǒude (there are) some (who are...); some (exist) 目的 mùdì purpose; aim; goal; target; objective 的确 (的確) díquè really; indeed

item.Q:
Write the character:
is; are; am; yes; to be
item.A:
shì
就是 jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as

item.Q:
Write the character:
(negative prefix); not; no
item.A:
bù
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

wǒ
我们 (我們) wǒmen we; us; ourselves

item.Q:
Write the character:
one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout
item.A:
yī
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
item.A:
yǒu
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
2: doctor
item.A:
1: dà 2: dài
广大 (廣大) guǎngdà vast; extensive 大夫 dàifu doctor; minister of state (in pre-Han states)

item.Q:
Write the character:
(located) at; (to be) in; to exist; in the middle of doing sth; (indicating an action in progress)
item.A:
zài
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

rén
人民 rénmín (the) people

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (modal particle intensifying preceding clause); (completed action marker)
2: to know; to understand; to know
item.A:
1: le 2: liǎo
为了 (為了) wèile in order to; for the purpose of; so as to 了解 liǎojiě understanding

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: within; among; in; middle; center; while (doing sth); during; China; Chinese
2: hit (the mark)
item.A:
1: zhōng 2: zhòng
中国 (中國) Zhōngguó China; Middle Kingdom 中毒 zhòngdú to be poisoned; poisoning

item.Q:
Write the character:
to (a place); until (a time); up to; to go; to arrive
item.A:
dào
得到 dédào to get; to obtain; to receive

item.Q:
Write the character:
resources; capital; to provide; to supply; to support; money; expense
item.A:
traditional: 資
zī
资产阶级 (資產階級) zīchǎnjiējí the capitalist class; the bourgeoisie

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: important; vital; to want; to be going to; must
2: demand; ask; request; coerce
item.A:
1: yào 2: yāo
主要 zhǔyào main; principal; major; primary 主要 zhǔyāo important

item.Q:
Write the character:
to use; according to; so as to; in order to; by; with; because; abbr. for Israel
item.A:
yǐ
可以 kěyǐ can; may; possible; able to

item.Q:
Write the character:
can; may; able to; certain(ly); to suit; (particle used for emphasis)
item.A:
kě
可以 kěyǐ can; may; possible; able to

item.Q:
Write the character:
this; these; this moment
item.A:
traditional: 這
zhè
这个 (這個) zhège this; this one

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: thing
2: (general classifier, for individual items or people); individual; this; that; size
item.A:
traditional: 個
1: ge 2: gè
这个 (這個) zhège this; this one 个人 (個人) gèrén individual; personal; oneself

nǐ
你们 (你們) nǐmen you (plural)

1: huì 2: kuài

item.Q:
Write the character: de
(yǒude de de)
item.A:
(possessive, modifying, or descriptive particle); of
有的 yǒude (there are) some (who are...); some (exist)

item.Q:
Write the character: dì
(mùdì de dì)
item.A:
aim; clear
目的 mùdì purpose; aim; goal; target; objective

item.Q:
Write the character: dí
(díquè de dí)
item.A:
really and truly
的确 (的確) díquè really; indeed

item.Q:
Write the character: shì
(jiùshì de shì)
item.A:
is; are; am; yes; to be
就是 jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as

item.Q:
Write the character: bù
(bùnéng de bù)
item.A:
(negative prefix); not; no
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

item.Q:
Write the character: wǒ
(wǒmen de wǒ)
item.A:
I; me
我们 (我們) wǒmen we; us; ourselves

item.Q:
Write the character: yī
(yīdìng de yī)
item.A:
one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character: yǒu
(méiyǒu de yǒu)
item.A:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character: dà
(guǎngdà de dà)
item.A:
big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
广大 (廣大) guǎngdà vast; extensive

item.Q:
Write the character: dài
(dàifu de dài)
item.A:
doctor
大夫 dàifu doctor; minister of state (in pre-Han states)

item.Q:
Write the character: zài
(xiànzài de zài)
item.A:
(located) at; (to be) in; to exist; in the middle of doing sth; (indicating an action in progress)
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character: rén
(rénmín de rén)
item.A:
man; person; people
人民 rénmín (the) people

item.Q:
Write the character: le
(wèile de le)
item.A:
(modal particle intensifying preceding clause); (completed action marker)
为了 (為了) wèile in order to; for the purpose of; so as to

item.Q:
Write the character: liǎo
(liǎojiě de liǎo)
item.A:
to know; to understand; to know
了解 liǎojiě understanding

item.Q:
Write the character: zhōng
(Zhōngguó de zhōng)
item.A:
within; among; in; middle; center; while (doing sth); during; China; Chinese
中国 (中國) Zhōngguó China; Middle Kingdom

item.Q:
Write the character: zhòng
(zhòngdú de zhòng)
item.A:
hit (the mark)
中毒 zhòngdú to be poisoned; poisoning

item.Q:
Write the character: dào
(dédào de dào)
item.A:
to (a place); until (a time); up to; to go; to arrive
得到 dédào to get; to obtain; to receive

item.Q:
Write the character: zī
(zīchǎnjiējí de zī)
item.A:
traditional: 資
resources; capital; to provide; to supply; to support; money; expense
资产阶级 (資產階級) zīchǎnjiējí the capitalist class; the bourgeoisie

item.Q:
Write the character: yào
(zhǔyào de yào)
item.A:
important; vital; to want; to be going to; must
主要 zhǔyào main; principal; major; primary

item.Q:
Write the character: yāo
(zhǔyāo de yāo)
item.A:
demand; ask; request; coerce
主要 zhǔyāo important

item.Q:
Write the character: yǐ
(kěyǐ de yǐ)
item.A:
to use; according to; so as to; in order to; by; with; because; abbr. for Israel
可以 kěyǐ can; may; possible; able to

item.Q:
Write the character: kě
(kěyǐ de kě)
item.A:
can; may; able to; certain(ly); to suit; (particle used for emphasis)
可以 kěyǐ can; may; possible; able to

item.Q:
Write the character: zhè
(zhège de zhè)
item.A:
traditional: 這
this; these; this moment; (commonly pronounced zhèi before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
这个 (這個) zhège this; this one

item.Q:
Write the character: ge
(zhège de ge)
item.A:
traditional: 個
thing
这个 (這個) zhège this; this one

item.Q:
Write the character: gè
(gèrén de gè)
item.A:
traditional: 個
(general classifier, for individual items or people); individual; this; that; size
个人 (個人) gèrén individual; personal; oneself

item.Q:
Write the character: nǐ
(nǐmen de nǐ)
item.A:
you
你们 (你們) nǐmen you (plural)

item.Q:
Write the character: huì
(shèhuì de huì)
item.A:
traditional: 會
can; be possible; be able to; to assemble; to meet; to gather; to see; union; group; association
社会 (社會) shèhuì society

item.Q:
Write the character: kuài
(kuàijì de kuài)
item.A:
traditional: 會
to balance an account; accounting
会计 (會計) kuàijì accountant; accounting
kěyǐ can; may; possible; able to

traditional: 這個
zhège this; this one

bùshi fault; blame
bùshì no; is not; not
yǒude (there are) some (who are...); some (exist)

traditional: 個人
gèrén individual; personal; oneself
bùkě cannot; should not; must not
kěshì but; however
wǒde my; mine

traditional: 不會
bùhuì improbable; unlikely; will not (act,happen etc); have not learned to; be unable to
bùyào don't!; must not

traditional: 大會
dàhuì general assembly; general meeting; convention
dàdà greatly; enormously
bùyī vary; differ
shìde yes
bùliǎo unable to; without end
bùzài not be in; be out

yàoshi if
yàoshì if
dàren adult; grownup
rénrén everyone; every person
yàobu otherwise; or; or else
